resources.title: 90 days of DevOps
reviews: This is a pretty good repository to get an understanding of tools used in DevOps.

resources.title: Linux Journey
review: This is a very good website to gain hands-on experience in Linux and bash.

resources.title: Docker Tutorial for Beginners [FULL COURSE in 3 Hours] - TechWorld With Nana
Kubernetes Tutorial for Beginners [FULL COURSE in 4 Hours] - TechWorld With Nana
review: This video is a bit outdated with the current trends in Kubernetes but good enough to gain a basic understading of k8s.

resources.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) course by Mumshad Mannambeth
Kubernetes labs on killer.sh
review: If you plan on taking a k8s certification, you're going to need to practice labs in here.

resources.title: AWS certification courses by Stephane Maarek
review: Go for this course if you have working experience with AWS and just want to clear the exam.

resources.title: AWS certification courses by Adrian Cantrill
review: Cantrill's courses are very in-depth and hands-on based and go for these if you want to learn AWS from scratch.

resources.title: Jenkins YouTube playlist in Hindi
review: A very good playlist to get started with Jenkins.
